document.docAuthor: Morales, Irina, Ferreira, Paulo S. F. & Forero, Dimitri
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic revision of Collaria Provancher, 1872 (Hemiptera: Miridae) with the description of a new species from the Afrotropical region

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic revision of Collaria Provancher, 1872 (Hemiptera: Miridae) with the description of a new species from the Afrotropical region

bibRefCitation.author: Provancher
bibRefCitation.refString: Provancher, L. (1872) Description de plusiers Hemipteres nouveaux-Heteropteres-Capsidae. Naturaliste Canadien, 4, 79.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Collaria meilleurii
Provancher, 1872
: 79
[n.sp., descr.];
Carvalho 1959
: 284
[catalog.]; Schwartz 2008 : 1179 [diag., morph.]; Schuh
2002–2014
[catalog].

Nabidea
coracina Uhler, 1878 : 398
[n.sp., syn. by
Uhler, 1887
: 230
]

subSubSection.paragraph:
Discussion. This species resembles
Collaria villiersi
by black coloration, but differs by antennal segments with short semi-erect spines, hemelytra brownish with a dark spot, and genitalia of male and female.
